body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Wood Motors. My name is Kenneth Wood. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Kenneth, my name is Michelle Russell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Michelle. Could you please provide me with your phone number so we can reach you easily?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is two one three - five five five - eight nine zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also share with me your email address for further communication purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is m i c h e l l e dot r u s s e l l at e x a m p l e dot c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Michelle. Is there anything specific you need assistance with regarding our services today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just exploring options at the moment. But I'm feeling happy with the support so far.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Michelle. Thank you very much for your time and interest in Wood Motors. Please feel free to reach out if you have any further questions. Have a wonderful day!
